semanticMarkup.know.lib

Class CSVGlossary

  • java.lang.Object
    • semanticMarkup.know.lib.CSVGlossary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGlossary

    public class CSVGlossary
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGlossary
    A CSVGlossary creates an IGlossary from a CSV file; expected CSV file format: word;category
